symbols.docstring: View all active cognitive patterns and their current focus areas
symbols.name: Description

symbols.docstring: Filters: - **all**: Show all defined patterns - **active**: Currently engaged patterns - **idle**: Available but unused patterns - **busy**: Patterns
symbols.name: Details
